articles.title: Beyonce donates $6m to coronavirus relief effort in US cities - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Money will be going to frontline workers and people affected by the pandemic
articles.content:
Beyonce has joined forced with Twitter CEO Jack Dorsey to donate six million dollars (£4.9 million) to the coronavirus relief effort.
The pop singer's BeyGood foundation announced the donation on Thursday, with the money going to frontline workers and people… [+1223 chars]

articles.title: Elton John postpones next leg of Farewell Yellow Brick Road Tour during COVID-19 pandemic - Daily Mail
articles.description: 'This tough decision has been made with the continued safety and well-being of his fans... and with the concern that these gatherings continue to risk accelerating the spread of the Coronavirus,' he said.
articles.content:
The end of the New Zealand and Australia leg of his farewell tour in February was marred by his ill health.
And now Elton John, 73, has announced he is unable to go ahead with the next leg in the United States due to the coronavirus pandemic.
